message.name: ERR_NO_VALID_ROOT
message.locale: "No valid XML Config found. The configuration root was not of type %1s. The configuration was not inserted."

message.name: ERR_CONFIGURATION_FILE_NOT_FOUND
message.locale: Could not find the Configuration File.

message.name: ERR_LOCATION_NOT_PROVIDED
message.locale: Location to download file to was not provided.

message.name: ERR_WRITING_TO_DOWNLOAD_FILE
message.locale: Problem writing to the download file. %1s
